content:
Just a reminder that the PA conference call is tomorrow at 11am eastern.
http://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/PA/2016-10-12+Agenda
Agenda items up for discussion, should we try and close out the Patient Identifiers based on all the discussions that have gone on here over the last few weeks?

We should probably spend some time on what to do with respect to meeting and connectathon activities at the meeting in Melboune Nov 7-8th http://www.hl7.org.au/events/3rd-hl7-australia-working-group-meeting-nov-2016-melbourne-vic/
Yes, that's good content for the agenda.

Reminder that the PA conference call is on today at 11am easter.
http://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/PA/2016-10-26+Agenda
Agenda items up for discussion will be primarily the agenda for the WGM, who's coming and items to be discussed.
Yeah; I'll connect at 11:00 AEDT today, not AEST like I did last time

Thank you to those who attended the WGM meeting here in Melbourne yesterday, the minutes can be found here:
http://confluence.hl7australia.com/display/PA/2016+November+8+WGM+Minutes
There is no call today due to the WGM yesterday.
The next call will be on 23rd November
Hi all - due to some issues with HL7 Australia GotoMeeting access the PA meeting that was due to run today has been cancelled.
